attributes.action: make a full public apology to those people HIS staff have attempted to smear with baseless falsehoods
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Prime Minister's special adviser, Damian McBride resigned on 11th April. 

It is not good enough for Gordon Brown to have issued a bland expression of regret. It is also patronising for government ministers to be sent out to TV studio's to tell us voters that we are more interested in other issues. 

The disclosure this week of what has been going on in the Prime Minister's 'War Room' brings British politics to a new low. It demands the Prime Minister take responsibility, show leadership, and make a genuine public apology.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
